name: obsidian-link-embed
description: This plugin allows you to convert URLs in your notes into embedded previews.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.copyBuild: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp main.js build/ && cp manifest.json build/ && cp styles.css build/
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run copyBuild
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run version && npm run copyBuild

author: SErAphLi
